name: Project Lightning

screenshots.caption: Early days yet... but expect it to get better from here!

short_description:
A team of some of the Blender Game Engine's most experienced users, making the best game we possibly can, using Blender's Game Engine to show the world what it can do in the hands of a team of professionals.

We'd love your help! Whether it's resharing us on Twitter or Facebook, contributing code, artwork, music, sound effects or contact with anyone you know in the media, Project Lightning relies on the community (that's you) to help show the world what's possible. Make it so!
summary: The game designed to push the limits of Blenders Game Engine. Join us!
